name: Lucky Ninja - Win Big Rewards
description:
Lucky ninja is a fantastic puzzle game of merging fruits to win prize. Train your ninja with special fruits, make your ninja become the strongest one in the world. Collect the box and try your luck to win big rewards!

Lucky ninja feature
Simple control - merge the fruits and upgrade them.
Variety fruits - there are 50 kinds of special fruits in the game, some rare fruits are waiting for you to collect them.
Mystery box - try your luck to win big rewards.
Prayer - try your luck to win a big prize.

Gameplay feature
Replication - add another ninja to help you earn more money.
Equipment - strengthening your equipment to earn more money.
Rhythm mode - upgrade the fruits to unlock rhythm mode.

Stop hesitating and enjoy playing the game to be a real winner!The more you play,the more you win!

Terms of Use: https://luckyninja.club/support/terms.htm
Privacy Policy: https://luckyninja.club/support/privacy.htm
